lead_paragraph: Foreign Minister Sergey V. Lavrov said that Russia would cooperate with the United States and European Union, but that “there will be no ‘business as usual’ anymore.”

headline.print_headline: Top Official Says Russia Will Defend Its Interests
headline.main: Russia Will ‘Reset’ Relations With West on Its Own Terms, Official Says

snippet: Foreign Minister Sergey V. Lavrov said that Russia would cooperate with the United States and European Union, but that “there will be no ‘business as usual’ anymore.”
abstract: Russian Foreign Min Sergey V Lavrov says Russia is ready to renew relations with United States and European Union, but only so long as arrangement proceeds on equal terms; says nation will continue to defend its own interests.
